SKT_FIRST.name: Super Cool Killing Machine
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks two enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.
description: Attacks two enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000070_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000070_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: スーパー殺戮マシーン
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>명중</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가합니다.\n\n이 스킬은 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 보유하고 있을 때 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与える。<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\nこのスキルは対象が<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Automaton of Rupture
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and reduces the <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> of all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>20</color>.\n\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n強化効果解除+1

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreases damage\nRecovers 20% Health
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nダメージUP\nHP20%回復

description: Attacks all enemies and reduces the <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> of all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>20</color>.\n\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고, 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20</color> 감소시킵니다.\n\n이 스킬은 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 보유하고 있을 때 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20</color>DOWNさせる。\n\nこのスキルは対象が<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The World Is Ours
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and recovers the <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>3.5%</color> for each target damaged.\n\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.
description: Attacks all enemies and recovers the <color=#28d9ed>Action Points</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000070_3_1]</color> for each target damaged.\n\nIf the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.

5: Increases duration of Invulnerability by 1 turn
5_jp: 自分に無敵付与+1ターン

SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: ワールド・イズ・アワーズ
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고, 피해를 준 대상마다 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>AP</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>3.5%</color> 회복합니다.\n\n이 스킬은 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 보유하고 있을 때 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、ダメージを与えた対象1体ごとに、自分の<color=#28d9ed>AP</color>を<color=#28d9ed>3.5%</color>獲得する。\n\nこのスキルは対象が<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の場合、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: If the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000070_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: If the target has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, damage dealt increases.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>약점 공략</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 보유한 대상에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>弱点攻略</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の対象に与えるダメージがUPする。
